description: React component 'ReceiptViewer' that displays an expense receipt, either as an image or as a download link, based on the receipt's filename and MIME type. It also includes an internal utility function 'isLikelyImage' to determine if the receipt is an image.

methods.name: ReceiptViewer({ expense })
methods.description: React functional component that renders an expense's receipt, either as an image or download link, with fallback message if no receipt is available.

methods.name: isLikelyImage(filename, mime)
methods.description: Utility function to determine if a given filename and MIME type suggest an image format.
